description.p: Add-in Controls are inserted using the *[ui:More...]* option in the *[ui:Data Controls]* section of the UX Builder.
Select the control you would like to add and click *[ui:OK]*.

In addition to the controls that ship with Alpha Anywhere, you can also create your own add-in controls. See *[link:How to Create Add-in Controls@https://documentation.alphasoftware.com/index?search=howto%20create%20addin%20controls]* to learn more.
